casebody.data:
Lillian DEAN, Petitioner, v. OFFICE OF PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT, Respondent. No. 03-3302. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Sept. 16, 2004. Paul Lomberg, Lomberg & Delvescovo, Hackensack, NJ, for Petitioner. David F. D’Alessandris, Harold D. Lester, Jr., David M. Cohen, Department of Justice, Washington, DC, for Respondent.

Before NEWMAN, MICHEL, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
